OOC: Jeesh I had to just read a lot of posts that I missed over the
weekend, and what a surprise, mostly argueing! Will some of you just
stop! On to the talk about the future of the RPG. I disagree with a
restart. This RPG has a great legacy, that shouldn't be destroyed.
However switching things up a bit. maybe even ending the Neo Beast Wars
in our story lines but continueing the story of the characters might be
good. I think the sequel idea fits this. Anyway, I'm ready to start
RPGing again, so here goes...

::Prowl/Hot Rod/Epyon/Skyburst::

They all watches as Azure worked with Nighstrike.
"So we wait then," said Prowl.

::DrillBit/KitKat2::

They sat together in a room, basicly doing nothing.

OOC: Ok, so nothing happaned in this post. Thats because I'm not sure
whats going on at Maximal City or Black Fortress right now.
